channel.title: 718 Help
channel.description: My Jar Client Is Stuck At Loading - please wait. Gathering updates. I am using Enth's Client and Entrinity As The Server. I'm using Perfect Cache 718/742 I'm not sure why it does this any help would be nice :)

item.title: 718 Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Make sure that your cache is truly being downloaded. Navigate to C:/Cache Directory/ and then open the client and try to see if files are actually being downloaded/created. And see if the directory even exists, if it doesn’t, that’s you problem.

Read full topic
